<hgroup>
<h1>Siamo ragazzi</h1>
<p>Cringe meta-ironic old meme generator</p>
</hgroup>
</div>

## Quick setup

Make sure [pipx] is installed, then:

```bash
pipx install siamo_ragazzi
pipx run siamo-ragazzi --version
pipx run siamo-ragazzi --help
```

See [the documentation] for more information.

[pipx]: https://pipx.pypa.io/latest/
[the documentation]: https://forge.steffo.eu/steffo/siamo-ragazzi/wiki
